text:
@realDonaldTrump @IngrahamAngle What Pres. Trump needs to do on Coronavirus:

-Reverse CDC cuts
-Appoint global health expert to coordinate response
-Increase emergency request with no Ebola funding cuts
-Expedite diagnostic testing kits
-Stop proliferation of junk insurance plans not covering Coronavirus tests
